text:
corrux | Senior Frontend Developer, Analytics and Backend Intern | Munich, Germany | ONSITE | INTERNS | €50-60K + equity

We are corrux, an analytics startup in the construction space. We leverage the increasing amounts of data collected on construction sites to increase efficiency and prioritize equipment maintenance.

We are searching for an experienced frontend developer to help create a fully-fledged platform that can flexibly display telemetry data from construction assets as well as alerts and statistics generated by our machine-learning models. You’ll have considerable freedom in choosing the stack and to align the implementation with well-defined customer requirements. You'll make a significant impact on the look & feel of the application as well as the direction of its GUI. Lastly, you’ll be helping to scale and shape the frontend team moving forward.

We're also hiring interns!

Apply here: https://corrux.io/career/

Or email me with any questions: ryan at corrux.io
